products.name: Carnation Breakfast Essentials Nutritional Drink Mix Light Start - 8 ct

extendedInfo.detail: Per Prepared Serving: 13 g protein; 21 vitamins & minerals; 2x calcium of a 6 oz cup of yogurt; 150 calories.  Light Start (1/3 less calories (150 vs 220 in our original powder)). No artificial flavors, colors. Nutritional Compass: Nestle HealthScience - It's good to know. Each prepared serving provides an excellent source of: Protein to help build muscle; 21 vitamins & minerals; calcium & vitamin D to help build strong bones. Just 150 calories. Provides essential nutrients to help start your day right! Questions/Comments: 1-800-289-7313 Monday-Friday, 8am-8pm ET.   Good nutrition from the start.  Enjoy the complete and balanced nutrition of Carnation Breakfast Essentials Products as part of your daily diet.   For ages 4 years and older.  Natural flavor with other natural flavors powder drink mix. Scan or call 1-800-289-7313 for more food information.  For other delicious recipes and nutrition information visit CarnationBreakfastEssentials.com. Can't find your favorites? Try online at BuyCBE.com.  Help our planet! Remember to recycle.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Nonfat Milk, Cocoa Processed With Alkali, Inulin (from Chicory), Vitamins And Minerals (Vitamins And Minerals: Calcium Phosphate, Magnesium Hydroxide, Sodium Ascorbate (Vitamin C), Choline Bitartrate, DL-Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Ferric Phosphate (Iron), Niacinamide, Manganese Sulfate, Copper Gluconate, Zinc Oxide, Calcium Pantothenate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride (Vitamin B6), Thiamine Mononitrate, Vitamin A Palmitate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid, Vitamin K1, Chromium Chloride, Sodium Molybdate, Vitamin D3, Biotin), Lactose, And Less Than 2% Of Soy Lecithin, Maltodextrin, Sugar, Carrageenan, Natural Flavor, Acesulfame Potassium, Sucralose.
extendedInfo.directions: Instructions: Empty packet into large glass. Stir in 1 cup cold, skim milk and. Enjoy! All prepared products should be tightly covered and consume within 2 hours at room temperature or within 24 hours if refrigerated.  Want to remix your breakfast? Try this delicious recipe! Chocolate Oatmeal Shake: Prep Time: 5 minutes. Makes 1 serving. Ingredients: 1 packet carnation breakfast essentials light start powder drink mix rich milk chocolate flavor. 1/2 cup quick-cooking oats. 1 cup water. 1 cup skim milk. 1/2 cup ice cubes. Directions: Combine oats and water in a microwaveable bowl; microwave on high for 1-1/2-2 minutes. Stir and let the mixture cool for a few minutes. Place milk, 1 powder drink mix packet, cooled oats and ice in a blender; cover. Blend until smooth.  Store in a cool dry place.  Lift tab to open.
extendedInfo.warnings: Contains: milk and soy ingredients. May contain wheat.
